availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George L. Thompson (Henry Co., grocery keeper)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, grocery keeper. Kentucky native. Son of William Thompson and Elizabeth Shivel Thompson. Married to Lucy A. Evans Thompson in Owen County, Kentucky, on May 13, 1859. Father of Madolie Thompson, Jenny V. Thompson, and Cora Thompson. Laborer in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocery keeper in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 141B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 436.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Peaks Mill, p. 186B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-58, Owen County Marriages, p. 11 of 13 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016135, Franklin County Deaths, File #17751, p. 1156.
